chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> expo m x y -> impls (Iter_orb m x) (Iter_orb m y)

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
impls = fun s1 s2 : set => forall z : dart, exds s1 z -> exds s2 z : set -> set -> Prop
expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
Iter_orb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => set_minus (fmap_to_set m) (Iter_rem m z) : fmap -> dart -> set
dart = nat : Set
card_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> card (Iter_orb m x) = Iter_upb m x
incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
exds_orb_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exds (Iter_orb m x) z -> exd m z
A_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y
A_1_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A_1 m k x = y -> cA_1 m k x = y
top_top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ pred m k y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = y
bottom_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y
top_top_bottom_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y
bottom_bottom_top_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = top m k y
expo_eq_exds_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> expo m z t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
incls_rem : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (Iter_rem m x) (fmap_to_set m)
expo1_eq_exds_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> expo1 m z t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
exds_rem_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m t -> ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
exd_Iter_orb_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let n := Iter_upb m z in exds (Iter_orb m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
B_1_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B_1 m k x = m
B_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B m k x = m
expo_symm : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t -> expo m t z
expo_trans : forall (m : fmap) (z t u : dart), expo m z t -> expo m t u -> expo m z u
expo_exd : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t -> exd m t
L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
period_expo : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t -> Iter_upb m z = Iter_upb m t
expo_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t -> degree m z = degree m t
L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
expo_refl : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> expo m z z
expo_expo1 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t < -> expo1 m z t
PL3 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
PL2 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
expo_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> {expo m z t} + {~ expo m z t}
exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> diff_orb m z
f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f m (M.f_1 m z) = z
M.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f m (M.f_1 m z) = z
M.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f_1 m (M.f m z) = z
upb_eq_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter_upb m z = degree m z
f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f_1 m (M.f m z) = z
exd_cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA_1 m k z) -> exd m z
exd_A_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A_1 m k z) -> exd m z
exd_A_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A m k z) -> exd m z
exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (bottom m k z)
exd_cA_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA m k z) -> exd m z

``` 
intros m x y H1 H2 H3 H4 H5.
unfold impls.
intros z H6.
unfold Iter_orb.
unfold set_minus.
rewrite -> fmap_to_set_I.
unfold exds in H6.
simpl in H6.
destruct H6 as [H6 | H6].
* apply A_cA with (k:=k) (x:=x) (y:=y); assumption.
* apply H4 with (z:=z); assumption.
```

original: intros m x y H1 H2 H3 H4 H5. unfold impls. intros z H6. unfold Iter_orb. unfold set_minus. rewrite -> fmap_to_set_I. unfold exds in H6. simpl in H6. destruct H6 as [H6 | H6]. * apply A_cA with (k:=k) (x:=x) (y:=y); auto. * apply H4 with (z:=z); auto.
